overview: Nikki Tyler is out of control as a malevolent, mysterious stripper leading a couple of unsuspecting country boys (Tom Byron and T.T. Boy) through a torrid maze of sex games, lies, deceit and depravity that spirals chaotically into a deadly obsession in James Avalon`s gritty new film.
tagline: She can't help but DESTROY the men in her sex life!
title: Carnal Instincts
